version_description:
Fixed issue where new purchases and new money manifested items would not save in some situations
Fixed issue where exiting affirmations caused a crash

Fixed issue where new purchases and new money manifested items would not save in some situations
Fixed issue where exiting affirmations caused a crash

Fixed issue causing cheques not to appear in some circumstances after a couple of days on inactivity.
Fixed issue in FAQ section preventing navigation back out of the FAQs.
Other fixes and optimizations

Fixed issue causing cheques not to appear in some circumstances after a couple of days on inactivity.
Fixed issue in FAQ section preventing navigation back out of the FAQs.
Other fixes and optimizations
Fixed an issue causing the app to crash when trying to save daily inspirations to camera roll.
Fixed an issue causing the app to crash when trying to save daily inspirations to camera roll.

***IMPORTANT!!!! - to all existing users, please BE AWARE that installing this update will return you back to Day 1 of the App. It will be like starting anew and therefore delete all of your past "Purchases" and "Manifested Money" entries. Do not install this update yet if you wish to retain your entries.

New languages - now available in English, German, French, Spanish, Korean and Japanese.
Improved automatic currency detection.
Video preview in App Store.

***IMPORTANT!!!! - to all existing users, please BE AWARE that installing this update will return you back to Day 1 of the App. It will be like starting anew and therefore delete all of your past "Purchases" and "Manifested Money" entries. Do not install this update yet if you wish to retain your entries.

New languages - now available in English, German, French, Spanish, Korean and Japanese.
Improved automatic currency detection.
Video preview in App Store.

- If you lost data in the previous update this update will allow you to restore your progress.
- Fixed issue with some language settings causing crashes on inspirations and affirmations.
- Other bug fixes and performance optimisations.

- If you lost data in the previous update this update will allow you to restore your progress.
- Fixed issue with some language settings causing crashes on inspirations and affirmations.
- Other bug fixes and performance optimisations.

- If you lost your data in a previous update this update will allow you to restore your progress.
- Fixed issue where application would display a notification badge number despite reading all notifications
- Fixed issue with daily teachings causing text to become invisible
- Other bug fixes and performance optimisations.

- If you lost your data in a previous update this update will allow you to restore your progress.
- Fixed issue where application would display a notification badge number despite reading all notifications
- Fixed issue with daily teachings causing text to become invisible
- Other bug fixes and performance optimisations.

- Several new currencies supported
- Supported currencies now available as manual selection in Settings
- Supported languages now available as manual selection in Settings
- Checks, Affirmations and Daily Teachings now available every day beyond Day 28 and into perpetuity

- Several new currencies supported
- Supported currencies now available as manual selection in Settings
- Supported languages now available as manual selection in Settings
- Checks, Affirmations and Daily Teachings now available every day beyond Day 28 and into perpetuity
Fix for issue where some users may experience crashes when first loading the app.
Fix for issue where some users may experience crashes when first loading the app.

>> New currency available for the Phillipines (PHP -> Pisos)
>> Bug fixes for iPhone X and other compatibility fixes

>> New currency available for the Phillipines (PHP -> Pisos)
>> Bug fixes for iPhone X and other compatibility fixes

Bug Fixes:
> Displaying old purchases in Today's Purchases.

Bug Fixes:
> Displaying old purchases in Today's Purchases.

>> New languages (Hindi & Chinese (Simplified/Traditional))
>> Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

>> New languages (Hindi & Chinese (Simplified/Traditional))
>> Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

New Affirmations added.
Design, graphics and functionality optimised for new screen sizes and operating system.

New Affirmations added.
Design, graphics and functionality optimised for new screen sizes and operating system.

New Giving practice
Daily Affirmations increase from 20 to 25
Now allows for cents to be recorded
Swiss francs currency added
Improved Notification controls
Fixed bug with Notifications
Fixed bug limiting alert tones
Overall improvement in design and functioning of app in line with current phones and latest version of operating system
Improved sharing to email and social media
Option to change name that appears on checks

New Giving practice

Now allows for cents to be recorded

Improved Notification controls
Fixed bug with Notifications
Fixed bug limiting alert tones
Overall improvement in design and functioning of app in line with current phones and latest version of operating system
Improved sharing to email and social media
Option to change name that appears on checks
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Made improvements to notifications to ensure you get your money on time.
General improvements to performance.

Made improvements to notifications to ensure you get your money on time.
General improvements to performance.
Tidied up settings for some devices experiencing missing notifications.
Tidied up settings for some devices experiencing missing notifications.
Updated Affirmations and handling dark mode on some devices.
Updated Affirmations and handling dark mode on some devices.
Updated the app to handle your desires which are full sentences.
Updated the app to handle your desires which are full sentences.
General improvements to performance
General improvements to performance

The Universe is sharing more from its accounts by giving you larger checks.

The Secret to Money is now available in Dominican Pisos by using the DOP currency in your settings.

The Secret to Money has an improved notification scheduler to support the latest devices.
